attributes.additional_details:
Allow NHS 111 to refer to private dental clinics out of hours.

Currently NHS 111 refuses to refer to www.emergencydentistinbirmingham.co.uk as it only provides private dental care albeit at NHS prices.

NHS 111 should offer the patient choices so that in the absence of NHS options, the patient can make a decision themselves to 'go private' rather than suffer with toothache.

Rikki Dhody, The Dentist, 57 Liskeard Road, Walsall, WS53EY
